response.original_title: Axe Dangerfield in Heart of Steal
response.overview: Axe Dangerfield is the only cop on the force with large enough cajones to put his foot down on the scum and villainy around, but having large cajones comes with a price, it comes with having a steel heart. Axe has been thrown off the force and can't return until he learns to soften his cold steel heart.
response.tagline: There’s nothing a montage won’t fix
response.title: Axe Dangerfield in Heart of Steal
